mapper.select: select pr_num, pr_name, (pr_categoryl||' > '||pr_categorys) as category, pr_issale, pr_price from pr_detail order by sysdate desc
mapper.insert: insert into pr_detail (pr_num, pr_name, pr_price, pr_issale, pr_mainimg, pr_contentimg, pr_thumb,pr_categoryl, pr_categorys, pr_season) values (#{pr_num},#{pr_name},#{pr_price},#{pr_issale},#{pr_mainimg},#{pr_contentimg},#{pr_thumb},#{pr_categoryl}, #{pr_categorys},#{pr_season})
mapper.select: select pro_num, pro_colorImg, pro_color, pro_size, pro_stock, pro_sales from product where pr_num=#{pr_num}
